revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSL-2640B |revision=B2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6348S |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16400B-7TL |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Wireless |default_ssid_regex=^Wireless$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=02:21:91 |oui_eth=00:21:91 }} "PCB MADE IN CHINA" and "REV:1.03" is silkscreened on the top of the board. This device is presumed to use BCM6348S (BCM6348SKFBG). *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=65308 Useless thread on the '''DD-WRT''' forums about the device] *[http://pudeev.livejournal.com/26318.html#comments Info on the device on '''pudeev''''s LiveJournal]
*[http://www.modem-help.co.uk/ASUSTeK/AAM6020VI-DL1-ADSL-11bg-WLAN-4-Port-Router.html Entry on '''modem-help''' about the device] :The noted FCC ID covers models AM6'''XXX'''VI-PD1, AM6'''XXX'''VI-'''XXX''', 6218-I3-'''XXX''', 6218-I4-'''XXX''' (where '''XXX''' = 0~9 / A~Z)
